DOC.brief_title: Sharing Our Strength : A Research Study Bone Marrow/Stem Cell Transplant Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: This study survivors hematopoietic stem cell transplantation ( also know bone marrow transplant ) , intensive medical treatment cancer leukemia , lymphoma , multiple myeloma well disease . Because physically emotionally demand treatment , many people report ongoing physical emotional difficulty transplant . The Sharing Our Strength study conduct help u understand people 's transplant experience test new program design help recover physically emotionally transplant . All part study complete mail telephone . Participants receive compensation time .
DOC.criteria: Be transplant survivor 9 month 3 year beyond transplant currently relapse . currently relapse Be least 18 year old ( least 16 transplant ) Speak English Have telephone service
